name: BLÖCK
description:
BLÖCK is an unforgiving and difficult precision 2D Platformer, which will demand a lot of patience and quick thinking from you.
The difficulty will raise exponentially throughout the unique levels of BLÖCK.



➤ 8 unique Levels, each with its own spectrum of colors.

➤ Earn in-game currency to upgrade the Speed, Jump Amount and Dash Power of your Player.

➤ Beat your own highscores and achieve max ratings on each level!

➤ Experience custom-made pixel art for each level.

➤ Enjoy the atmospehric and gameplay enhancing retro music.

➤ Dodge Lasers, jump over electricity and move fast when crossing ghost platforms!



Will you persist and beat the game?
